mapper.select: select ec.id,ec.title,ec.price,ec.lesson_num as lessonNum,ec.cover,ec.price as price, et.name as teacherName,es.title as subjectLevelOne,es2.title as subjectLevelTwo from edu_course as ec left join edu_teacher as et on ec.teacher_id=et.id left join edu_course_description as ed on ec.id=ed.id left join edu_subject as es on ec.subject_parent_id=es.id left join edu_subject as es2 on ec.subject_id=es2.id where ec.id=#{courseId}

select ec.id,ec.title,ec.price,ec.lesson_num as lessonNum,ec.cover, ec.buy_count as buyCount,ec.view_count as viewCount, ed.description as description, et.id as teacherId,et.intro as intro,et.name as teacherName,et.avatar as avatar, es.id as subjectLevelOneId,es.title as subjectLevelOne, es2.id as subjectLevelTwoId,es2.title as subjectLevelTwo from edu_course as ec left join edu_teacher as et on ec.teacher_id=et.id left join edu_course_description as ed on ec.id=ed.id left join edu_subject as es on ec.subject_parent_id=es.id left join edu_subject as es2 on ec.subject_id=es2.id where ec.id=#{courseId}
